What are the treatments for Stargardt macular degeneration ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Stargardt macular degeneration:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Stargardt Disease 3  - Genetic Testing Registry: Stargardt disease 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Stargardt disease 4   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions
